Name: MicrobiologicalProcedure
Title: Microbiological Procedure
Descriptino: Valueset Snomed CT Codes of Microbiological Procedures

Name: ChLabOrderLabStudyTypes
Title: Laboratory Study Types
Descriptino: refers to https://wiki.ihe.net/index.php/1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3.2.1, but without some errors

Name: ChLabVSOrderControl
Title: Order Control Codes used in CH Lab-Order
Descriptino: Contains some codes of placer applications from v2-0119 table

Name: ClinicalFocusVitaminD
Title: Vitamin D all possible clinical contexts for test
Descriptino: Broadest value set that may be referenced by ObservationDefinition.validCodedValueSet

Name: NormalReasonsVitaminD
Title: Contexts for reimbursement of the vitamin D test
Descriptino: Diese Valueset listet die Standardantworten auf die Frage "Verordnungskontext für den Vitamin-D-Test" auf, die eine Erstattung dieses Tests erlauben.

Name: ObservationTriggeredByTypeVS
Title: Observation TriggeredBy Type
Descriptino: Possible reasons why an observation was triggered by another.

Name: ReasonsForOrder
Title: All Valid Reasons for Ordering a Lab Service
Descriptino: Broadest value set that may be referenced by ObservationDefinition.validCodedValueSet

Name: DocumentEntryClassCode
Title: DocumentEntry.classCode
Descriptino: Document class as per EPRO-FDHA Annex 3

Name: DocumentEntryLanguageCode
Title: DocumentEntry.languageCode
Descriptino: Document language as per Annex 3 EPRO-FDHA. Defines the language in which the document was written.

Name: DocumentEntryTypeCode
Title: DocumentEntry.typeCode
Descriptino: Type of document as per Annex 3 EPRO-FDHA.     The code defines a document’s type (e.g. discharge report, laboratory report). Each document type should be assigned to precisely one document class.

Name: ProcedureCodes(SNOMEDCT)
Title: Procedure Codes (SNOMED CT)
Descriptino: Procedure Code: All SNOMED CT procedure codes.

Name: Hl7VSOrderControl
Title: hl7VS-orderControl
Descriptino: Concepts which are used to determine the function of the order segment.  Depending on the message, the action specifies by one of these control codes may refer to an order or an individual service.
